Html: i want to concatenate two wav file and merge last 2 seconds of first file with first 2 seconds of second file and create new file. means when first file last two second remaining, another file should start in background(merging).

You can use WaveFileReaders and WaveFileWriter to easily concatenate. Use the WaveFormat.AverageBytesPerSecond to see how much you need to read. Mixing is a bit more complicated, since you normally do it with sample providers and a MixingSampleProvider. Have a look at AudioFileReader, MixingSampleProvider and OffsetSampleProvider, in order to create your concatenated and mixed stream.
